TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 為原本不支援加密之權杖處理加密的包裝權杖。

span.span: A wrapping-token that handles encryption for a token that does not natively support it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，無法加密本身，才能發出加密的 SAML11 判斷提示，請將包裝與並提供適當。For example, a cannot encrypt itself, so to issue an encrypted SAML11 assertion, wrap a with an and provide appropriate .
